trans-unit.resname: PW24·11 | Transmutation Font | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Create your choice of a Blood token, a Clue token, or a Food token.\n{3}, {T}, Sacrifice three artifact tokens with different names: Search your library for an artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}：依你的选择派出一个血滴衍生物，一个线索衍生物或一个食品衍生物。{3}，{T}，牺牲三个名称各不相同的衍生神器：从你牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: PW24·12 | Oltec Matterweaver | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a creature spell, choose one —\n• Create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.\n• Create a token that's a copy of target artifact token you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放生物咒语时，选择一项～•派出一个1/1无色地侏衍生神器生物•派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控的衍生神器之复制品。
